design_philosophy.vibe: High-Voltage, Cultural, Rhythmic, Professional yet Chaotic
design_philosophy.theme_strategy: Dark Mode Default (The Stage) with Neon Accents
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix traditional cultural motifs with cyberpunk neon aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like a beat drop.
Content is King: Photos are the heroes; UI is the stage.
Contrast: Deep blacks vs. Blinding neons.

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Unbounded' for all section titles. Weight: 700 or 900. Letter-spacing: -0.02em.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Manrope' for all readable text. Weight: 400. Line-height: 1.6.
usage_rules.accents: Use 'Rock Salt' for small decorative elements, signatures, or 'hand-written' notes.

usage.secondary: Gradients, hover states, stage lighting effects.
usage.background: Deep void black. NEVER pure black (#000000), use #030712.
usage.gradients: Use 'bg-gradient-to-r from-rose-500 to-indigo-600' for text clips or button backgrounds.

grids.gallery: Bento Grid: Mix of col-span-1, col-span-2, and row-span-2 items. Asymmetric.
grids.team: Grid of cards with hover-reveal details. 3 columns on desktop, 1 on mobile.

buttons.style: Pill-shaped or Sharp Edges. High contrast.
buttons.classes: rounded-full font-bold tracking-wide transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(244,63,94,0.5)]

cards.classes: bg-gray-900/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 hover:border-rose-500/50 transition-colors duration-300

navigation.style: Floating Dock or Sticky Glass Header.
navigation.classes: fixed top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 z-50 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/10 rounded-full px-8 py-4

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the entire body with 'opacity-5' and 'pointer-events-none'.

motion.scroll: Use 'framer-motion' for scroll-triggered reveals (Fade Up, Zoom In).
motion.hover: All interactive elements must have a 'scale' or 'glow' effect on hover.

visual_enhancers.decorations: Use abstract 'spotlight' gradients (large blurred circles of Primary/Secondary color) behind key sections.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-energy marketing site. Do not make it look like a corporate dashboard. Use the 'Electric Night' theme.
instructions_to_main_agent.setup: Install 'framer-motion' and 'lucide-react' immediately. Add the Google Fonts to 'index.css'.
instructions_to_main_agent.admin_panel: The Admin Panel should be distinct from the public site. Use a cleaner, more functional 'Control Room' aesthetic (Dark Gray background, less neon) for the admin routes.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Use Shadcn UI for the Admin Panel (Forms, Tables). Use Custom Tailwind Components for the Public Landing Page to ensure uniqueness.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
